fields.name: AggregateState
fields.description: Aggregate state of Arc agent across the nodes in this HCI cluster.

fields.name: ArcApplicationClientId
fields.description: App id of arc AAD identity.

fields.name: ArcApplicationObjectId
fields.description: Object id of arc AAD identity.

fields.name: ArcApplicationTenantId
fields.description: Tenant id of arc AAD identity.

fields.name: ArcInstanceResourceGroup
fields.description: The resource group that hosts the Arc agents, ie. Hybrid Compute Machine resources.

fields.name: ArcServicePrincipalObjectId
fields.description: Object id of arc AAD service principal.

fields.name: ConnectivityProperties
fields.description: contains connectivity related configuration for ARC resources

fields.name: DefaultExtensions
fields.description: Properties for each of the default extensions category

fields.name: PerNodeDetails
fields.description: State of Arc agent in each of the nodes.

fields.name: ProvisioningState
fields.description: Provisioning state of the ArcSetting proxy resource.
